name: Stickman Water Trampoline FREE - Flipping Summer!
name_original: Stickman Water Trampoline FREE - Flipping Summer!
description:
From the creators of the #1 App Stickman Trampoline, we bring you Stickman Water Trampoline with all-new tilted device feature!

Join the greatest trampolinists in the water world as you flip and spin in the summer heat in this amazingly addictive game! Tilt your device to land on different sides of the trampoline, but don't fall off! Top GameCentre leaderboards in this summer themed game!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

* Easy to learn, hard to master!
* Jump up to 750ms in height!
* Game Center Leaderboards
* Real-life physics for an awesome gaming experience!
* All-New tilted device feature!
* Endless levels for hours of fun!

Join over 2.5 million people who have downloaded our games, and download Stickman Water Trampoline NOW!

After all, who doesn't want an amazing FREE game?

Check out the PRO version for an Ad-Free experience!
